subject: Re: Champion Stables - Updates to Shipping

Hi Jamie, 

Quick question, do you want the Quote Cart button always visible... Or only visible once there is an item in the quote cart?

Hi Joel and Heath,

Heath, I’ll call through shortly after this email.

> 3. We have setup a floating button that appears in the top right when they add a product on the request a quote.

I think the floating button is a bit strange. Can you please remove and update the nav as per the mockup attached?

Firstly I've cleaned up the menu and added a dropdown to About.
The hover isn’t quite working. Can you please have a look at this?
Secondly I’ve added Quote Cart and Cart to the righthand side of the menu.
I’ve just done this really quickly via WP menus and added some inspector css overrides. I think you’ll need to do it differently to pull in the cart counts.
Missing from those new buttons are the cart icons, can these please be added?
Can we have a list icon for the Quote Cart and the regular shopping cart icon for the Cart?



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

Hi Jamie,

Confirming we have updated the staging site. Please see below

1. Regarding the shipping on configuration, I just disabled the shipping zone for now and add the AU flat rate of 35.
2. Header flat rate text is now removed.
3. Homepage flat rate text is now removed.
4. Product single page Shipping zones table have been removed. 

Regarding the request from previous email
1. We have updated layout when they add the product. 
2. Removed the shipping zone table
3. We have setup a floating button that appears in the top right when they add a product on the request a quote.
4. The header was actually there before we set it up. Email header dimensions was - 1200 x 260
5. Added a header image.  Done. https://staging-championstables.kinsta.cloud/request-quote/

Let me know if this works for you? and also if you want to push it to live.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Can you please apply these updates to Champion Stables (live) when the request a quote feature has been finalised and installed?

  1. Shipping Configuration: Remove all shipping options and replace with a flat rate of $35 store wide.
    • We'll override bulky products with the request a quote checkout option.
  2. Site header: Remove the Flat Rate Shipping Storewide! Text link form the top header
  3. Homepage: Remove Flat Rate Shipping Storewide! references
  4. Products Layout: Remove the Shipping Zone table from the product pages

Thanks!












Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Dalligator

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@dalligator.com.au
// web dalligator.com.au
